name: CPS Consolidation
description:
This is an augmented reality consolidation of the work I created for one of my post-grad classes.

Each week a theme was set and within class time, an object relating to it needed to be created. 

To get the app to work correctly you will need to print out the included cards, which also have explanations of the theme and how the work relates to it.

DOES NOT WORK ON WINDOWS/ MAC.

ANDROID ONLY
